nodes.text: Preigo's Traveling World of Wonder was a traveling intergalactic attraction run by the Dug Preigo and often enjoyed by Hondo Ohnaka. It was based on Florrum.

At one point during the Clone Wars, Hondo's gang had captured the Jedi Padawan learner Ahsoka Tano. A number of Jedi younglings came to her rescue and infiltrated the circus as performers, using their Force powers to perform tricks that won them positions. When they affected their rescue, the pirates of Ohnaka's gang attacked, and Preigo was forced to escape, leaving behind many of his acts.
